xtc.lang.cpp

Interface Syntax.LanguageTag

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTag
    Enclosing class:
    Syntax

    public static interface Syntax.LanguageTag
    The interface for language tags.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getID()
      Get the tag's ID.
      String getText()
      Get the tag's text.
      boolean hasName()
      Determine whether the tag has a name.
      Syntax.PreprocessorTag ppTag()
      Return the preprocessor token tag.

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        int getID()
        Get the tag's ID. The returned number is used by the LR parser to identify the language token.
        Returns:
        The ID.

      • getText

        String getText()
        Get the tag's text. For language tokens with a fixed text, this method returns that text. Otherwise, it returns null.
        Returns:
        The text.

      • hasName

        boolean hasName()
        Determine whether the tag has a name. Keywords and identifiers have names and thus can be replaced by macro expansion in the preprocessor. Punctuation does not have a name.
        Returns:
        true if the tag has a name.

      • ppTag

        Syntax.PreprocessorTag ppTag()
        Return the preprocessor token tag.
        Returns:
        The preprocessor token tag.
